com.cloudpos.printer

Class Format

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudpos.printer.Format

  • public class Format
extends java.lang.Object
    打印格式根接口,程序定义的打印格式必须实现该接口.

        public Format()

    • Method Detail

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String value)
        Set print format using key-value.

        as follows:

        1. density

          values is: light,medium,dark.

          effective for char, picture and barcode.

        2. bold

          values is: true. false.

          effective for char.

        3. reverse

          values is: true. false.

          effective for char.

        4. inversion

          values is: true,false.

          effective for char.

        5. line-through

          values is: 1(continuous). 2(disconnected).

          effective for char.

        6. size

          values is: extra-small. small. medium. large. extra-large.

          effective for char.

        7. align

          values is: left. right. center.

          effective for char and picture.

        8. italic

          values is: true. false.

          effective for char.

        9. HRI-location

          values is: none(not print). up(upper of barcode). down(down of barcode).up-down(up and down of barcode).

          effective for barcode.

        Parameters:
        key -
        value -

      • getParameter

        public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the specified format parameter.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        parameter of the inputed key.

        public void remove(java.lang.String key)
